segments.en: “Mendicants, a farmer has three primary duties.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati paṭikacceva khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti sumatikataṃ.
segments.en: A farmer first of all makes sure the field is well ploughed and tilled.

segments.pli: Paṭikacceva khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karitvā sumatikataṃ kālena bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
segments.en: Next they plant seeds in season.

segments.pli: Kālena bījāni patiṭṭhāpetvā samayena udakaṃ abhinetipi apanetipi.
segments.en: When the time is right, they irrigate the field and then drain it.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi kassakassa gahapatissa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
segments.en: These are the three primary duties of a farmer.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tīṇimāni bhikkhussa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
segments.en: In the same way, a mendicant has three primary duties.
Undertaking the training in the higher ethics, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.

segments.pli: imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bhikkhussa pubbe karaṇīyāni.
segments.en: These are the three primary duties of a mendicant.
So you should train like this:

segments.pli: ‘tibbo no chando bhavissati adhisīlasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhicittasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhipaññāsikkhāsamādāne’ti.
segments.en: ‘We will have keen enthusiasm for undertaking the training in the higher ethics, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.’

sections.title: “Mendicants, a farmer has three primary duties.

suttaplex.blurb: The duties of a farmer are like those of a mendicant.
